entry.title: Too Far Gone
entry.content:
“Men should be men”. But “Men are not allowed to show their weakness”

So I let my weakness grow too much so that it has impeded my should-have masculinity.

“The unexamined life is not worth living”. But too much examination can be harmful(思而不学则殆).

So I forgot the habit of self-reflction and let myself gone too far.

Probably I should learn more about Hegel’s dialectics to balance my stance.

entry.title: The Nostalgia of The Rebel
entry.content: People talk about Camus when it comes to a serious post-modernism situation. They parade the independence of their minds as if that is something valuable. Oh, but my friend, you are just another drunken guy just you get drunk with Nietzsche and Camus.
